array.name: desc
array.item: It is language for front end

array.name: detail
array.item:
Java platform-independent language, 
meaning that it can run on any operating 
systonce and run it anywhere.
Java code is compiled into bytecode, w
 hich can be run on any platform that has a Java Virtual Machine (JVM) installed.

JavaScript is a client-side scripting language, 
which means it runs directly in a user's web browser.

JavaScript is often used to add interactivity and functionality to web pages, 
such as form validation, animations, and dynamic content updates.

Python is an interpreted language, 
meaning that code is executed line-by-line instead of 
compiled ahead of time.

Python is dynamically typed, 
meaning that variable types are determined at 
runtime instead of being declared in advance.
